biotools.summary: Discovering sequence motifs in quantitative peptide data. It allows generating artificial neural network models of receptor-ligand interactions. It takes as input a set of ligand sequences with target values; it returns a sequence alignment, a binding motif of the interaction, and a model that can be used to scan for occurrences of the motif in other sequences.

bioschemas.name: NNAlign
